{{cpp/title|is_placeholder}}
{{cpp/utility/functional/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=functional|since=c++11|
template&lt; class T &gt;
struct is_placeholder;
}}

If {{tt|T}} is the type of a standard placeholder {{tt|(_1, _2, _3, ...)}}, then this template is derived from {{c/core|std::integral_constant&lt;int, 1&gt;}}, {{c/core|std::integral_constant&lt;int, 2&gt;}}, {{c/core|std::integral_constant&lt;int, 3&gt;}}, respectively.

If {{tt|T}} is not a standard placeholder type, this template is derived from {{c/core|std::integral_constant&lt;int, 0&gt;}}.

A program may specialize this template for a {{lsd|cpp/language/type#Program-defined type}} {{tt|T}} to implement {{named req|UnaryTypeTrait}} with base characteristic of {{c/core|std::integral_constant&lt;int, N&gt;}} with positive {{c|N}} to indicate that {{tt|T}} should be treated as {{c|N}}{{sup|th}} placeholder type.

{{lc|std::bind}} uses {{tt|std::is_placeholder}} to detect placeholders for unbound arguments. 

===Helper variable template===
{{ddcl|since=c++17|1=
template&lt; class T &gt;
constexpr int is_placeholder_v = is_placeholder&lt;T&gt;::value;
}}

{{cpp/types/integral_constant/inherit2|placeholder value or {{c|0}} for non-placeholder types|int}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;functional&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;type_traits&gt;

struct My_2 {} my_2;

namespace std
{
    template&lt;&gt;
    struct is_placeholder&lt;My_2&gt; : public integral_constant&lt;int, 2&gt; {};
}

int f(int n1, int n2)
{
    return n1 + n2;
}

int main()
{
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "Standard placeholder _5 is for the argument number "
              &lt;&lt; std::is_placeholder_v&lt;decltype(std::placeholders::_5)&gt;
              &lt;&lt; '\n';
    
    auto b = std::bind(f, my_2, 2);
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "Adding 2 to 11 selected with a custom placeholder gives " 
              &lt;&lt; b(10, 11) // the first argument, namely 10, is ignored
              &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
Standard placeholder _5 is for the argument number 5
Adding 2 to 11 selected with a custom placeholder gives 13
}}
